nodes.text: Young Jedi Knights: Under Black Sun
Young Jedi Knights: Under Black Sun is a compilation published by the Science Fiction Book Club of the final three books in the Star Wars: Young Jedi Knights series:

When the Galactic Empire died, they were born—a new hope for the New Republic. The young twins of Han Solo and Princess Leia have grown strong with the Force, thwarting the evil Nolaa Tarkona and destroying the Emperor's Plague. Now, with their friends Lowbacca the Wookiee and Tenel Ka, the future heroes of a legendary saga meet new dangers.
